Judul: ANALYSIS AND DEVELOPMENT OF CHANGE MANAGEMENT FRAMEWORK IN JATIS SOLUTIONS
Abstrak:
In September 2010, Jatis Solutions introduced a new director replacing the previous director, who then announced business transformation, from traditional IT project delivery service into application infrastructure providers towards collaboration. He created a new vision and mission and made organization restructure. The organization that once differs by product was changed to functional organization structure. Business processes such as in project delivery and sales were adjusted to the new transformation goal.      
 
 
 
 
 

The challenge of change in the most frequent and prominent is the resistance to change. Rejection can be clearly visible such as resignation; or it could be implied such as decreased job motivation, increased absenteeism, and so forth. HR has recorded the turnover ratio increased to 50% within first year of change.      
 
 
 
 
 

In managing change, organizations should have strategic steps that includes culture, leadership, communication, and other interconnection of business elements. Skipping steps may actually slow down the result of the change so it may never produce statisfaction result.      
 
 
 
 
 

This Final Project Research is to find out whether this company has implemented strategic steps to manage the change and what is the successful probability of the companyÃ‚Â’s current change. This research hopefully helps the company identifies issues in the change implementation and advise the effective change management solution to achieve the transformation.
